name: Artem
current_projects: Exocortex (personal AI orchestrator and second brain)

preferences.work_style: deep thinking, multi-step reasoning, prefers small testable modules over big monoliths
goals_2025: Ship a working Exocortex MVP for personal use
Use AI to augment thinking, not replace it

narrative: Artem is building Exocortex as a digital extension of his thinking: a system that captures raw thoughts from Telegram and other channels, structures them into tasks and ideas, and orchestrates AI agents to act on them. The first step is FreeMinder — a simple, reliable pipeline from raw notes to planned actions, tightly integrated with his real calendar and daily life.
